data.text: @ShashiTharoor Best wishes @ToilessIN #TravelAlly #IWD2022 - thanks for sharing 👍 - such initiatives need to be spread far and wide in India - where toilets are inside #propaganda domain

@sonasun1071 @ShashiTharoor This is not Woola . TOILESS is not a start up,  is a volunteer driven decentralised platform. enterprises join as Travel Allys offering toilets and other travel related facilities. each toiless is a  responsibility of each enterprise who gets more business,  brand goodwill.

@ShashiTharoor Nitesh Chouhan wants to raise funds for RAISING FUNDS TO PAY MY COLLEGE FEES. Your donation has the power to help them move closer to their goal amount. Please contribute. https://t.co/z07CVwuEDJ

@LakshminmMenon @ShashiTharoor Isn't this already telecasted in Shark Tank India? On which Sharks rejected saying, if google can show hotels, restaurants, etc. certainly it can add the feature to show clean toilets. I don't know if i'm talking sense. All the best.
@ShashiTharoor Sir, Thank you very much for your support.@ShashiTharoor

@ShashiTharoor Joker failed ukrain
Many in India too
